pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bridge Sampling for Marginal Likelihoods and Bayes Factors // Provides functions for estimating marginal likelihoods, Bayes factors, posterior model probabilities, and normalizing constants in general, via different versions of bridge sampling (Meng Wong, 1996, http://www3.stat.sinica.edu.tw/statistica/j6 n4/j6n43/j6n43.htm).
